name: pwachallenge
description: A postbox progressive webapp with a Knockout UI

scripts.build: babel src -d lib && find src -name '*.html' | xargs -I {} echo cp {} {} | sed 's/src/lib/2' | sh && r.js -o app.build.js && cp node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js .

author: Sebastian Gfeller
